Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2929 affecting package dhcp for versions less than 4.4.3.P1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-2929 affecting package dhcp for versions less than 4.4.3.P1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package dhcp is earlier than 4.4.3.P1-1, affected by CVE-2022-2929
